title: McFETCH
description: McFETCH is a web-based solution to easily and effectively access satellite data.
This project is built off of the McIDAS software and allows for diverse and robust searches on a large collection of data.
Through this user interface, the client is able to easily and intuitively construct detailed queries on the McFETCH system.
Additionally, the user is able to download this data and can track his or her usage stats through this webpage.
